snippet: Russells, the law firm responsible for revealing that J.K. Rowling wrote a mystery novel under a pen name, also apologized to her.
abstract: Russells, London law firm responsible for revealing that J K Rowling is author of detective novel The Cuckoo’s Calling, has agreed to make substantial donation to charity as part of an apology.
lead_paragraph: Russells, the law firm responsible for revealing that J.K. Rowling wrote a mystery novel under a pen name, also apologized to her.

headline.main: To Make It Up to Rowling, Law Firm Makes a Donation
headline.print_headline: Law Firm in Rowling Flap to Make Amends With a Charitable Donation
